data.Name: Ternion Sound
data.Bio: This mighty trio is made of dubstep veterans Nostalgia, Apparition, & Johnny Foreplay. A staple in the Minneapolis underground scene, they recently formed together to push each other to even greater heights in sound design, composition, and live performance. It hasn't been long, but Ternion Sound is already seeing support from industry legends such as Distance, J:Kenzo, N-Type, The Widdler. Read more on Last.fm
